## TRUTH Ã— EXPERIENCE Charter Compliance

**This PR must satisfy BOTH criteria. Charter violations are valid grounds for rejection.**

### TRUTH Checklist
- [ ] **TRUTH criteria satisfied**: Changes are correct, defensible, and verified by passing tests
- [ ] All tests pass (unit + integration)
- [ ] Business logic changes have corresponding test coverage
- [ ] No frozen engine code modified (`dna-matrix/core/evaluation.py`)

### EXPERIENCE Checklist
- [ ] **EXPERIENCE criteria satisfied**: Changes deliver confidence, intuition, and emotional credibility
- [ ] User-facing changes maintain clarity and trust
- [ ] No misleading or confusing output introduced
- [ ] Edge cases handled gracefully (no silent failures)

### Charter Review
- [ ] **TRUTH_AND_EXPERIENCE.md reviewed**: Charter principles applied to this PR
- [ ] See: [`docs/TRUTH_AND_EXPERIENCE.md`](../docs/TRUTH_AND_EXPERIENCE.md)
